entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shoal Lake 5:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -25.9°C
Wind: NW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
